short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase your productivity when using Creator Voice with this extension. Fast & easy voice message creation in a matter of seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension integrates the services of Creator Voice into an easy to use interface that can be directly utilized for fast voice message creation.
